At Maco Painting, quality, professionalism, and attention to detail set us apart. Over two decades, we've established ourselves as a trusted painting contractor known for superior craftsmanship, lasting value, and customer satisfaction. Our cost-effective solutions make us the preferred choice for designers, contractors, developers, and homeowners.

Our Story

Founded in 2001 by Mario Cetroni, a graduate of Williamson College of the Trades (Class of 1993, Structural Coatings and Painting), Maco Painting was built on skill, integrity, and the drive to redefine painting services. Today, as a family-owned business, we continue upholding these core values.

Our Team

Our strength lies in our highly skilled team of painters and craftsmen, whose dedication and expertise ensure every project embodies Maco Painting's standards of excellence. From residential repaints to extensive commercial projects, our team consistently delivers professional results.

Customer-Focused Service

  • Maintaining a clean, organized workspace
  • Managing dust and noise effectively using dustless sanding technology
  • Ensuring thorough post-project cleanup
  • Ethically disposing of waste

Our use of advanced sanding systems ensures a flawless, high-quality finish while reducing airborne particles.

Service Areas & Licensure

Proudly serving Chester, Delaware, and Montgomery counties, and the Main Line area.

PA License: PA115278

Residential & Commercial Expertise

  • Professional, courteous, and timely
  • Respectful of your property and privacy
  • Efficient to minimize disruptions

Systematic Approach, Stunning Results

Our proven, systematic process ensures consistent quality, producing results that our clients and team proudly showcase.

Why Choose Maco Painting?

With a legacy of excellence, a commitment to customer satisfaction, and adherence to high-quality standards, Maco Painting is your trusted partner for exceptional painting services in Pennsylvania.
